summary: This adds Nordick from the elder strolls grave to valtheim towers
descriptionHtml:
If You used to read the blog \"The Elder Strolls\" then you are probably bummed at Nordricks Untimely Demise,This mod simply adds 2 gravestones next to valtheim towers(Thats the dungeon where nordrick died , Its on the main road north of whiterun) .One for Nordrick, one for Jasper.Feel free to head there and pay your respects to the greatest anti-adventurer skyrim has ever seen!

Sorry that comments are disabled I really dont know whats causing it . If I knew I would enable them , sorry guys if you have something to say go to the official thread or pm me 

Eddieawsome
author: Eddieawsome
